title: MockupStyles
description: Data containing information about the available mockup styles

placement.description: Catalog product placement for which the mockup styles defined in `mockup_style_ids` could be used.

display_name.description: Placement display name that can be shown to end-customers.

print_area_width.description: Print area width of a placement defined in inches

print_area_height.description: Print area height of a placement defined in inches

mockup_styles.description:
A list of available mockup styles for example:
  * On the hanger
  * On the Male/Female model
  * Flat on the table
  * etc.

id.description: Identifier of mockup style. This value is intended to be used when specifying the mockup styles during mockup generator task creation _[Create mockup generator tasks](#operation/createMockupGeneratorTasks)_.

category_name.description: The category name of the mockup style

view_name.description: Display name of mockup view. View determines a point of view of the camera. E.g to the right or left to the mockup.

restricted_to_variants.description: A list of variants that this style is restricted to. If `null`, this means that there are no restrictions and the style can be used with all variants
